definition: returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: But on the other hand, it is such a beautiful sight!
sentences.chinese: 但是話說回來，這是一個非常美麗的景象。

sentences.english: How do these high school kids spend their time, anyway?
sentences.chinese: 話說回來，這些高中小孩們到底是怎麼打發時間的？

sentences.english: But then again, maybe we wouldn't see them.
sentences.chinese: 但話說回來，可能是我們沒有看到。

sentences.english: And once again, it's also my responsibility to prove that I can do other things.
sentences.chinese: 話說回來，我也有責任去證明我能演別的角色。

sentences.english: But again, just put those details aside.
sentences.chinese: 但話說回來，撇開這些細節不談。

sentences.english: But then again I like the lovely gherkins and the crisp crunchy lettuce.
sentences.chinese: 話說回來，我也喜歡可愛的小黃瓜和鮮脆的生菜。

sentences.english: But, then, the quick fix lifestyle today is getting more and more popular.
sentences.chinese: 但是，話說回來，現在快節奏生活方式越來越普遍了。

sentences.english: But it would be unfair to blame my failure entirely on my parents.
sentences.chinese: 不過話說回來，把責任全推給父母可不公平。
